lead_paragraph: A politician in the city of Marietta said in a Facebook post that young Republicans would have a leg up for summer jobs at the state Department of Transportation.

headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Youth Apply Here? City Official Stirs Outcry
headline.main: A Promise to Favor Republicans for Ohio Jobs Spurs Call for Inquiry

snippet: A politician in the city of Marietta said in a Facebook post that young Republicans would have a leg up for summer jobs at the state Department of Transportation.
abstract: Facebook post by Marietta, Ohio, City Council member Cindy Oxender stating that young Republicans who apply for job at Ohio Dept of Transportation would be given more favorable treatment than other applicants prompts Democratic state lawmakers to call for investigation into agency's hiring process.
